A Thousand and One.desc: Struggling but unapologetically living on her own terms, Inez is moving from shelter to shelter in mid-1990s New York City. With her 6-year-old son Terry in foster care and unable to leave him again, she kidnaps him so they can build their life together. As the years go by, their family grows and Terry becomes a smart yet quiet teenager, but the secret that has defined their lives threatens to destroy the home they have so improbably built.
A Thousand and One.cast: Teyana Taylor, William Catlett, Josiah Cross, Aven Courtney

Riceboy Sleeps.desc: In the 1990s, Korean native So-young loses her husband and decides to immigrate to Canada with her only son, Dong-hyun. Both experience their respective hardships and battles. Primarily, they are subjected to racism. Dong-hyun has to contend with bullying from classmates, while So-young contends with sexism. As a result, a rift forms between them, making it harder to cope and adjust.
Riceboy Sleeps.cast: Choi Seung-yoon, Ethan Hwang, Dohyun Noel Hwang, Anthony Shim

Chevalier.desc: In the eighteenth century, Joseph Bologne, Chevalier de Saint-Georges, arrives in Paris, causing a stir amongst the French aristocracy, given his controversial lineage as the illegitimate son yet sole heir of an enslaved African and a French plantation owner. Yet the young man's palpable talent for the violin soon transforms his fate, allowing him to rise through the ranks of society to pursue a career as a composer until a torrid affair causes his star to burn out. Based on true events.
Chevalier.cast: Kelvin Harrison Jr., Samara Weaving, Lucy Boynton, Alex Fitzalan

Haunted Mansion.desc: Inspired by the classic theme park attraction, “Haunted Mansion” tells the story of Gabbie (Rosario Dawson), a single mom, who discovers that the home she and her son share is haunted by irksome ghosts. Hoping to restore domestic tranquility, Gabbie recruits a motley crew of so-called spiritual experts to help rid the house of the supernatural squatters. A nonstop blend of action, adventure and comedy featuring an all-star cast that includes LaKeith Stanfield, Tiffany Haddish, Owen Wilson, Danny DeVito, Daniel Levy, Jamie Lee Curtis and Jared Leto, “Haunted Mansion” was written by Katie Dippold and directed by Justin Simien. The film’s producers are Dan Lin and Jonathan Eirich, with Nick Reynolds and Tom Peitzman serving as executive producers.
Haunted Mansion.cast: Lakeith Stanfield, Tiffany Haddish, Owen Wilson, Jared Leto

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant May.desc: The Turtle brothers as they work to earn the love of New York City while facing down an army of mutants.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant May.cast: Ayo Edebiri, Rose Byrne, Seth Rogen, Jackie Chan

The Super Mario Bros. Movie.desc: While working underground to fix a water main, Brooklyn plumbers—and brothers—Mario and Luigi are transported down a mysterious pipe and wander into a magical new world. But when the brothers are separated, Mario embarks on an epic quest to find Luigi.
The Super Mario Bros. Movie.cast: Chris Pratt, Charlie Day, Anya Taylor-Joy, Jack Black

PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie.desc: When a magical meteor crash lands in Adventure City, it gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into The MIGHTY PUPS. For Skye, the smallest member of the team, her new powers are a dream come true. But things take a turn for the worse when the pups' archival Humdinger breaks out of jail and teams up with a mad scientist to steal the superpowers for the two villains. With the fate of Adventure City hanging in the balance, the Mighty Pups have to stop the supervillains before it's too late,and Skye will need to learn that even the smallest pup can make the biggest difference.
PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie.cast: Mckenna Grace, Taraji P. Henson, Marsai Martin, Christian Convery

Elemental.desc: In a city where fire, water, land, and air residents live together, a fiery young woman and a go-with-the-flow guy are about to discover something elemental: How much they actually have in common.
Elemental.cast: Leah Lewis, Mamoudou Athie, Ronnie Del Carmen, Shila Ommi

Rally Road Racers.desc: Racers compete in a high-stakes rally along the famous Silk Road trade route.
Rally Road Racers.cast: Chloe Bennet, Sharon Horgan, J.K. Simmons, Catherine Tate

Ready Jet Go! Space Camp.desc: Jet Propulsion, an alien from the planet Bortron 7, is always on the quest for adventure. Inspired by his favorite TV show character Great Galacto, Jet and his pet Sunspot go comet surfing, riding waves in outer space. When Sunspot gets too close to dangerous comet dust, he develops an allergic reaction that causes him to shrink. Jet must now search for a cure before Sunspot shrinks away completely. Will Jet and his friends be able to come up with a plan before time runs out?
Ready Jet Go! Space Camp.cast: Ashleigh Ball, Anthony Bolognese, Vienna Leacock

Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse.desc: Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Spider-Verse saga, an epic adventure that will transport Brooklyn’s full-time, friendly neighborhood Spider-Man across the Multiverse to join forces with Gwen Stacy and a new team of Spider-People to face off with a villain more powerful than anything they have ever encountered.
Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse.cast: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Oscar Isaac, Jake Johnson
Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse.director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Justin K. Thompson, Kemp Powers

This Place.desc: A coming-of-adulthood story about two women falling in love for the first time. As they grow closer, each is forced to confront their family histories in unexpected ways, while navigating multiple legacies of grief and love.
This Place.cast: Devery Jacobs, Priya Guns, Janïsa Weekes, Alex Joseph

Shortcomings.desc: A trio of young Bay Area urbanites--Ben Tanaka, Miko Hayashi, and Alice Kim--as they navigate a range of interpersonal relationships, traversing the country in search of the ideal connection.
Shortcomings.cast: Justin H. Min, Sherry Cola, Ally Maki, Tavi Gevinson

Red, White & Royal Blue.desc: When the son of the American President and Britain's prince public feud threatens to drive a wedge in U.S./British relations, the two are forced into a staged truce that sparks something deeper.
Red, White & Royal Blue.cast: Jemma Redgrave, Thomas Flynn, Bridget Benstead, Nicholas Galitzine

Sun Moon.desc: After being left at the altar, a young woman escapes to Taiwan on a quest for hope and healing.
Sun Moon.cast: Michael Jong-Quin Huang, Madison McLaughlin, Leanne Morgan, Mackenzie Mauzy

Love Again.desc: It centers on a woman who, after tragically losing her fiancé, starts to send romantic texts to his old cell. It turns out the number has been reassigned to a man across town suffering from a similar heartbreak. The two meet and feel an undeniable connection but can’t seem to leave the past behind. Until Celine Dion and her music gives them the courage to take a chance on love again.
Love Again.cast: Sam Heughan, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Céline Dion, Celia Imrie

Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.desc: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldaña, Bradley Cooper, Dave Bautista

Simulant.desc: Faye attempts to replace her newly deceased husband, Evan, with an android simulant (SIM). Although SIM Evan appears like human Evan in every way, Faye does not feel the same love for SIM Evan as it does for her. SIM Evan tries to win Faye back while at the same time being on-the-run from a government agent chasing down SIMs who have become “conscious” and could potentially be a threat to humankind.
Simulant.cast: Robbie Amell, Jordana Brewster, Simu Liu, Sam Worthington

The Martian.desc: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.
The Martian.cast: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels

The Goonies.desc: Kids find a treasure map and go searching for pirate's booty in a subterranean cavern, but they run into a band of outlaws and their ringleader, whose soft-hearted son comes to the kids' rescue.
The Goonies.cast: Sean Astin, Josh Brolin, Jeff Cohen, Corey Feldman

Interstellar.desc: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
Interstellar.cast: Matthew McConaughey, Jessica Chastain, Anne Hathaway, Michael Caine

The Matrix.desc: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.
The Matrix.cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving

The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The.desc: C.S. Lewis's beloved fantasy novels come to life in this enchanting adventure, which features scenes not shown in theaters. It's the tale of four British children who enter a magical world, where they befriend wondrous creatures and battle a witch (Tilda Swinton). Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, William Moseley, Anna Popplewell. Directed by Andrew Adamson.
The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The.cast: Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, William Moseley, Anna Popplewell
